title: Single Justice Procedure cases - Press view/Achosion Gweithdrefn Un Ynad - Golwg i’r Wasg
header: Single Justice Procedure cases - Press view/Achosion Gweithdrefn Un Ynad - Golwg i’r Wasg
whatIsSJP: What are Single Justice Procedure cases?/Beth yw achosion Gweithdrefn Un Ynad?
sjpDescription: Cases ready to be decided by a magistrate without a hearing. Includes TV licensing and minor traffic offences such as speeding./Achosion sy’n barod i’w penderfynu gan ynad heb gynnal gwrandawiad. Mae’n cynnwys troseddau trwyddedu teledu a mân droseddau traffig fel goryrru.
name: Name/Enw
downloadButton: Download a copy/Llwytho copi i lawr
